subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Bilbao, which routed Barcelona, 4-0, in the first leg of the Spanish Super Cup, secured a 1-1 draw that gave the club its first trophy since a Copa del Rey title 31 years ago.
snippet: Bilbao, which routed Barcelona, 4-0, in the first leg of the Spanish Super Cup, secured a 1-1 draw that gave the club its first trophy since a Copa del Rey title 31 years ago.
